title: Civilian Marksmanship Program

certificate.alt: CMP Certificate of Affiliation - Wayland Rod & Gun Club #013778 is affiliated with the Civilian Marksmanship Program for 2024

description: The Wayland Rod & Gun Club is proud to be affiliated with the Civilian Marksmanship Program (CMP). This affiliation provides our members with access to CMP programs, competitions, and training opportunities that promote marksmanship through firearms training, safety, competitions and youth programs.

seo.title: Civilian Marksmanship Program - Wayland Rod & Gun Club
seo.description: Wayland Rod & Gun Club is an official CMP affiliated club, providing members access to Civilian Marksmanship Program training, competitions, and youth programs.
